definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Reed root flavour Kennedy sex cold, can clear away heat carambola.
sentences.chinese: 芦根味甘性寒，能清热生津。

sentences.english: Objective To make a rapid determination of ferulic acid and identification of its structure in rhizome of Phragmites communis (RPC).
sentences.chinese: 目的对芦根中阿魏酸含量和结构进行快速测定和分析。
